system.requirements:
Tier 3;  WS 40, Two Weapon Wielder (Melee)
Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Finesse, Unaligned
system.effect: When armed with two One-Handed Melee Weapons each with the Balanced Quality. Reduce penalty for Two-Weapon Fighting by 10, (from -20 to -10, or to +0 if also possessing the Ambidextrous Talent)
